A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointed. This is a movie of great moments\, but overall busy with nonsense. I was constantly entertained but hate the direction. SPOILER ALERT! How can this movie end so optimistic when the rebels are now down to 30 people on board the Falcon??? So many lives have been lost including Skywalker\, why is everyone smiling and hugging during the finale? The tone of this movie was totally wrong\, I don't blame Johnson\, he's dealing with a super studio.
